text: Howard McGillin (born November 5, 1953 in Los Angeles, California) is an American actor. He played John Jasper in The Mystery of Edwin Drood and The Phantom in Andrew Lloyd Webber's The Phantom in the Opera. ==Other websites== * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors
title: Howard McGillin
